There are a range of resources for analysing spatial data with R, A major pleasure in working with spatial data is their visualisation. This project uses open source spatial data to inform data visualisations
```{r}
data <- read.csv('https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/berkeleyearth/climate-change-earth-surface-temperature-data?select=GlobalLandTemperaturesByMajorCity.csv')
```
